content.title: ROOM RENTAL AGREEMENT
clauses: The Tenant shall pay rent in the amount of SGD 500.00 per month
A security deposit of SGD 2000.00 shall be paid
Tenant agrees to allow the Landlord unrestricted access to the premises at all hours
Utilities shall be borne entirely by the Tenant
The Tenant is responsible for all repairs
Subletting is prohibited unless the Landlord personally profits from it
Pets are not allowed, except for those owned by the Landlord
The Tenant waives all legal rights
The Agreement shall last for 99 years
Governing Law: This Agreement shall be governed by the Laws of Singapore
Late payment of rent shall incur a penalty
Tenant must perform weekly entertainment for the Landlord without compensation
Any noise complaints made by the Tenant will be considered a violation of this Agreement
The Landlord reserves the right to use Tenant's room for storage of personal items
Tenant shall provide free labor for all landlord's projects
The Tenant must ask permission before breathing loudly within the unit
Any guest visiting the Tenant must pay an entrance fee to the Landlord
Tenant must maintain the apartment temperature strictly within Landlord's comfort range
If the Tenant leaves behind any belongings, they automatically become property of the Landlord
Tenant must display unwavering gratitude towards the Landlord at all times
Renovations or improvements carried out by Tenant become permanent gifts to the Landlord
The Tenant may not question the fairness of any clause in this Agreement
Tenant shall not look directly at the Landlord's personal possessions without prior written consent
The Tenant agrees to pay additional 'Goodwill Rent' whenever the Landlord feels underappreciated
The Landlord is entitled to 50% of all Tenant's lottery winnings, inheritances, or found coins on the street
Tenant must surrender all control of kitchen appliances
Any attempt by the Tenant to move out requires a six-year written notice
The Tenant must water the Landlord's plants and apologize if they wilt, regardless of fault
Tenant is responsible for all noise created by neighbors, nearby construction, or passing airplanes
Final Clause: The Landlord reserves the right to add, remove, or modify any clause in this Agreement at any time without Tenant's knowledge or consent.
